title: Dear my Doll -~Kimi to no Yakusoku~
original_name: ティアマイドール～きみとの約束～
sinopse: Lim and Iota live in a robot country. Lim, who is in love. Iota, whom she loves. The kind robotic maids. Lim has always thought her sunshine-filled days would go on forever, but... what is this promise Iota made with her in the past and the secret that he's keeping from her? (Source: Iskultrip Scans)
